con:testStep.name: Manual Test - Validate Product Attributes in Magento
con:testStep.con:description:
Validate the following created products and it's attributes:
1. Check for existance of created Configurtion and Simple products via API call 2. Check all the following attributes of configuration as well as simple products w.r.t. input payload of API call > SKU > Name > Style Number > Product Type > Colour > Status >Care Details > Colour Filter > GTIN Number ( EAN in input payload) > Colour Set ID ( product_group in input layload)

con:config.con:expectedResult: All above product's attributes values should be matched with the input payload of API call.
